titles.title: To prohibit pay raises for the Vice President and any senior political appointee at a Federal agency subject to a lapse in appropriations, and for other purposes.
No Political Pay Raises During Shutdowns Act
No Political Pay Raises During Shutdowns Act
No Political Pay Raises During Shutdowns Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.
